reference.title: MME support for assigning UE usage type (Decor) on IMSI range basis (Feature f11601-06): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature allows the CMM to define UE usage type based on local provisioning on a per-IMSI-range basis. With this feature, operators can provide Décor service without HSS functionality.

table.title: MME support for assigning UE usage type (Décor) on IMSI range basis: feature summary

li.ph: MME support for dedicated core network (Feature f11601-01)
MME support for dedicated core networks – mode 2 P-GW selection (Feature f11601-02)
MME support for dedicated core networks - mode 1 (Feature f11601-03)

row.entry: Applies to home PLMN, shared PLMN, and treat-as-home subscriber PLMN.
